name: Forecast Info
format: {{data.cell01}} {{data.cell02}} {{data.cell03}} {{data.cell04}} {{data.cell05}} {{data.cell06}} {{data.cell07}} {{data.cell08}} {{data.cell09}} {{data.cell10}}

name: Format forecast data
Format current data
Status Receiver
Send to flow
Set threshold
func:
flow.set("threshold", msg.payload);

return msg;

name: Get Watering Status
func:
msg.payload = flow.get("status");

return msg;

name: Set forecast string

label: Outdoor
tooltip: Turn on to switch to outdoor mode which take weather forecast into account

name: Set mode
README
info:
If outdoor then weather forecast will be taking into account when deciding to activate watering system.
Else forecast will be set to "000000".

name: Sender
func:
msg.payload = flow.get("send");
return msg;

name: Receiver
Data Encoder
Get moisture value
func:
msg.payload = flow.get("moisture");


return msg;

name: Data Decoder
Formatter
Prevent Duplication
func: rbei

name: Prevent Duplication
func: rbe

name: Exclude Timestamp
func:
msg.payload = flow.get("send").slice(12);

return msg;

name: About http message format...
info:
Note: [{Name-of-property}:{Number-of-character}]

The string receive from ESP (composed by Arduino) will follow the format:
[Status:1][Moisture:4][Threshold:4]

The string to be sent to ESP and to save on cloud service:
[Year:2][Month:2][Day:2][Hour:2][Min:2][Sec:2][Status:1][Moisture:4][Threshold:4][Forecast:6]

label: Auto Watering
payload: The watering cycle is used manually

name: M - I
func:
msg.payload = "Switched to manual. Currently idling."

return msg;

name: M - W
func:
msg.payload = "Switched to manual. Currently  watering.";

return msg;

name: Set flow.status
Set flow.status
Set flow.status
A - I
func:
msg.payload = "Switched to auto. Currently idling."



return msg;

name: A - W
func:
msg.payload = "Switched to auto. Currently watering.";



return msg;

name: Send notification
A-I noti
func:
msg.noti = "We have already watered your plants";

return msg;

name: A-W noti
func:
msg.noti = "We are now watering your plants";

return msg;
